events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit and I want to return it for a full refund.
The issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request to return the product.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. to assist with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your return and refund.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
Sure, the order number is #7845123. Yes, the jacket is still unused and in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We have initiated your return authorization. Please ship the jacket back within 7 days.
Thanks for the fast response and clear instructions. I will send it back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your card within 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your help and quick service.
We are closing this case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
